option.name: notice
option.value: Copyright Notice for $project.name Copyright (c)$originalComment.match("Copyright \(c\) (\d+)", 1, "-") at ThunderGames | SwtPra10 $today.year File created on $today by $username Latest changes made by $username on $file.lastModified All contents of "$file.className" are protected by copyright. The copyright law, unless expressly indicated otherwise, is at ThunderGames | SwtPra10. All rights reserved Any type of duplication, distribution, rental, sale, award, Public accessibility or other use requires the express written consent of ThunderGames | SwtPra10.
